author: Loren Grush
title: SpaceX is making its own hand sanitizer and building face shields to donate to fight coronavirus
description: SpaceX is making its own hand sanitizer and face shields in order to donate the materials to help fight the coronavirus pandemic, according to an internal memo. The company also plans to host a blood drive at its headquarters in Hawthorne, California.
content:
A new memo shows the company is trying to help
SpaceX is manufacturing its own hand sanitizer and face shields with plans to donate the materials to hospitals and places in need to help fight the novel coronavirus pandemic, according to an internal memo firs… [+2856 chars]
